Configuration.Name: L1=L2=20m_central_5A_apx7p5_NO_TILT_STAGE
Configuration.SetupScript: sics.execute('hset /instrument/velocity_selector/setspeed 28300') sics.execute('hset /instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength 5') config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 19250 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 150 config.guide = 'ga' config.apx = -47 config.bs = 2 config.beamcenterx = 88.6889 config.beamcenterz = 94.7248 config.drive()
